Posts.Content: Lynn721 wrote: I am scheduled for a biopsy of my right breast on March 14th 2019. Radiologist said no shadowing on ultrasound and edges appear clear. A birad of 4. 11mm in size. I'm holding on to every positive thing the radiologist said but preparing for the worst. I'm so scared. Log in to post a reply
